label: Execute Inline Commands
description: Runs inline commands found in the README. Prefers the previous `extract` (target: inlineCode) output when available; otherwise scans backtick code spans.
rationale: Automates validation of inline CLI/code snippets so docs stay runnable and accurate.

requiresPrevious.message: The previous step must be `extract` with `target: inlineCode` and scope `document`.
